sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { MenuService } from '../../../services/menu.service'; import { NavbarMobileMenuComponent } from './navbar-mobile-menu/navbar-mobile-menu.component'; import { AngularSvgIconModule } from 'angular-svg-icon'; import { NgClass } from '@angular/common'; @Component({ selector: 'app-navbar-mobile', templateUrl: './navbar-mobile.component.html', styleUrls: ['./navbar-mobile.component.scss'], standalone: true, imports: [ NgClass, AngularSvgIconModule, NavbarMobileMenuComponent, ], }) export class NavbarMobileComponent implements OnInit { constructor(public menuService: MenuService) {} ngOnInit(): void {} public toggleMobileMenu(): void { this.menuService.showMobileMenu = false; } }
